==Details==
These are as of Version 0.5.4
===Descriptions===
speedrun.com page will be linked here. Also this will memorialize all first places throughout history.
===Rules=== # Auto-clickers are not allowed # Must have the video recorded in its entirety. # The run starts once you catch your starter. # Shiny% excludes the starter. # Video must end on the Statistics Screen. # Clock changes for Time based Pokemon is allowed. # Glitches may be used if they aren't otherwise specified.
===Categories===
{| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Category !! How to finish |- | Kanto Champion% || Beat Blue |- | Mew% || Catch Mew |- | Route 230% || Complete Route 230 |- | Shiny% || Catch 1 Shiny |- | Shiny Dex% || Catch every Shiny |- | Kanto Dex% || Catch the Whole Kanto Dex |- | Millionaire% || Make {{pdollar}}1,000,000 |- | Shard% || Max 1 shard tree |- | Full Shard% || Max all shard trees |- | GodKarp% || Get Shiny Magikarp |- | Bidoof% || Get Bidoof |- | Carpal tunnel% || Click 50,000 Times |}
===Record History=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Category !! Name !! Run Time !! Date and Time |- | Kanto Champion% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Mew% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Route 230% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Shiny% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Shiny Dex% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Kanto Dex% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Millionaire% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Shard% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Full Shard% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | GodKarp% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- | Bidoof% || No one || 9999:99:99 || Dawn of Time |- |}
